entry.title: Kamigamo Shrine・上賀茂神社
entry.content:
A bright red maple tree along the path to the entrance of Kamigamo Jinja shrine. The flags are promoting Shichi-Go-San, a shrine festival for 7, 5, and 3 year olds.

上賀茂神社の参道沿いの真っ赤なモミジ。七五三の旗が立っている。

entry.title: Red Leaves・かえで
entry.content:
I love shooting maple leaves lit from behind, which makes them glow like stained glass. They are highlighted by the morning sunlight filtering through the trees.

カエデの葉を後ろから照らすと、ステンドグラスのように輝いて見える。木漏れ日が葉を際立たせている。

entry.title: Hogon-in・宝厳院
entry.content:
A sunny morning. An oasis of peace and tranquillity, steps away from the crowds. At the garden of Hogon-in Temple, a sub-temple of Tenryu-ji.

晴れた朝。人混みから少し離れた、静寂と安らぎのオアシス。天龍寺の塔頭、宝厳院の庭園にて。

entry.title: Observation Deck・展望台
entry.content:
I love coming up here and looking down at the Katsura/Oi/Hozu River (it changes names) as it winds its way through the gorge. I've taken many photos from here.

私はここに来て峡谷を縫うように流れる大堰川を見下ろすのが大好きだ。 ここからたくさんの写真を撮ってきた。
entry.summary: I love coming up here and looking down at the Katsura/Oi/Hozu River (it changes names) as it winds its way through the gorge. I've taken many photos from here.

entry.title: Bamboo Destruction・竹の破壊
entry.content:
Respect of nature is one of the main principles of Japanese culture. Carving your name in a bamboo tree is a good way to injure or even kill it.

Defacing trees in the Bamboo Grove is one of many factors driving recent anti-foreigner sentiment in Japan.

自然を敬うことは日本文化の基本原則のひとつである。竹に名前を刻むことは、竹を傷つけたり、枯らしたりすることになる。

竹林の木を傷つけることは、最近の日本における外国人排斥感情を駆り立てる多くの要因のひとつである。
entry.summary: Respect of nature is one of the main principles of Japanese culture. Carving your name in a bamboo tree is a good way to injure or even kill it. Defacing trees in the Bamboo Grove is one of many factors driving recent anti-foreigner sentiment in Japan.

entry.title: Yoshidayama・吉田山
entry.content:
A view of northeastern Kyoto from atop Yoshidayama on a warm, sunny afternoon, with the city nestled against distant mountain ranges.

暖かな日差しの中、吉田山の頂から眺める京都北東部の風景。
